mapper.select: select d.*,c.*,m.nickName,nvl(likeyCnt,0) likeyCnt from diary d,member m ,(select * from (select ROWNUM rn,community.* from (select * from COMMUNITY order by COMMUNITYNUM desc) community ) order by rn) c ,(select communityNum,count(*) likeyCnt from communitylikey group by communityNum) cl where d.DIARYNUM=c.DIARYNUM and c.communityNum=cl.communityNum(+) and d.memberNum=m.memberNum and rn between 1 and 5

select d.*,c.*,m.nickName,nvl(likeyCnt,0) likeyCnt from diary d,member m ,(select * from (select ROWNUM rn,community.* from (select * from COMMUNITY order by COMMUNITYNUM desc) community ) order by rn) c ,(select communityNum,count(*) likeyCnt from communitylikey group by communityNum) cl where d.DIARYNUM=c.DIARYNUM and c.communityNum=cl.communityNum(+) and d.memberNum=m.memberNum and rn between #{startNum} and #{startNum} +4
